# Repository Metadata

This file contains metadata for social media previews and discoverability.

## Social Media Preview

To set a social preview image for this repository:

1. Go to repository Settings
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Upload an image (1280x640px recommended)
4. Suggested text overlay: "ADMENSION - The Only Link Shortener That Pays You"

- Logo/branding for ADMENSION
- Tagline: "The Only Link Shortener That Pays You â€” Automatically"
- Visual elements: Link icon, dollar signs, modern gradient
- Color scheme: Match the platform's purple/blue gradient theme
